summary: All Dwarven items, actors, and perks are now called \"Dwemer\", plus new smelting recipes
descriptionHtml:
This mod is an overhaul of Dwarven items and smithing. Since the term \"Dwarven\" is actually a misnomer, it ought to be replaced with the more politically correct \"Dwemer\".

Summary of changes:
[list]
[*] New smelting recipes for cogs, gyros, levers, etc.
[*] Some weights have been rebalanced to reflect the number of ingots produced (e.g. Dwarven Solid Metal now weighs 5 units since it produces 5 ingots). Most \"junk\" items (cogs, gears, pans) now weigh 1 unit and produce 1 ingot for the sake of convenience (no leftovers).
[*] The names of all Dwarven items now start with \"Dwemer\" (e.g., Large Dwemer Strut -> Dwemer Large Strut) for better inventory sorting.
[*] Dwarven spiders, spheres, and centurions are called \"Dwemer\"
[*] The Dwarven Smithing perk is also called \"Dwemer\"
[/list]

TODO: 
[list]
[*] s/dwarven/dwemer/gi
[*] Rename enchanted weapons and armor (there are a lot, so it will take awhile)
[/list]
author: dbbolton
